Paragraph: This command will take in the text of the file input.txt and produce a human readable output of the tokens and their character offsets:
This command will take in the text of the file input.txt and produce a human readable output of the tokens and their character offsets:
Example: java edu.stanford.nlp.pipeline.StanfordCoreNLP -annotators tokenize -outputFormat conll -output.columns word -file input.txt
